sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-checkout', templateUrl: './checkout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkout.component.css'], }) export class CheckoutComponent { checkoutForm = new FormGroup({ firstName: new FormControl('', Validators.required), lastName: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl(''), country: new FormControl(''), address: new FormControl(''), zipCode: new FormControl(''), state: new FormControl(''), }); }

checkout works!
